content.title: The shawshank redemption
content.short_summary: Summaries. Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency. Chronicles the experiences of a formerly successful banker as a prisoner in the gloomy jailhouse of Shawshank after being found guilty of a crime he did not commit.

content.title: The Godfather
content.short_summary: It is the first installment in The Godfather trilogy. The story, spanning from 1945 to 1955, chronicles the Corleone family under patriarch Vito Corleone (Brando), focusing on the transformation of one of his sons, Michael Corleone (Pacino), from reluctant family outsider to ruthless mafia boss.

content.title: The Dark Knight
content.short_summary: A gang of criminals robs a Gotham City mob bank, murdering each other for a higher share until only the Joker remains; he escapes with the money. Batman, District Attorney Harvey Dent and Lieutenant Jim Gordon form an alliance to rid Gotham of organized crime.

content.title: Lord of the Rings
content.short_summary: An ancient ring, which has been lost for years, is found and accidentally ends up with the little Hobbit Frodo.

cover.alt: Trailer of The Lord of the Rings

content.title: Inception
content.short_summary: Inception is the story of Dom Cobb (Leonardo DiCaprio), a thief of the mind called an extractor who enters the dreams of high powered individuals and steals their secrets via an architect. The architect is responsible for building the world of the dreamer, convincing them their surroundings are real.

content.title: Pulp fiction
content.short_summary: Pulp fiction is the masterpiece of writer-director Quentin Tarentino. Coming back to the cinema! Honey Bunny and Pumkin, two petty thieves, come to the conclusion that it is becoming too risky to raid liquor stores. During breakfast in a coffee shop they decide that there is more to get.

content.title: Avengers
content.short_summary: S.H.I.E.L.D. has located the mysterious Tesseract device and the Army's super soldier Captain America. The Tesseract is actually a gateway to an entirely new world called Asgard. A mysterious being known as Loki arrives on earth and immediately assumes that he can rule all human beings.

content.title: Forrest Gump
content.short_summary: Forrest Gump is a simple man with a low I.Q. but good intentions. He is running through childhood with his best and only friend Jenny. His 'mama' teaches him the ways of life and leaves him to choose his destiny.

content.title: Goodfellas
content.short_summary: The story of Irish-Italian American, Henry Hill, and how he lives day-to-day life as a member of the Mafia. Based on a true story, the plot revolves around Henry and his two unstable friends Jimmy and Tommy as they gradually climb the ladder from petty crime to violent murders.

content.title: Instestellar
content.short_summary: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival. Earth's future has been riddled by disasters, famines, and droughts. There is only one way to ensure mankind's survival: Interstellar travel.

content.title: Toy story
content.short_summary: Woody and the gang go on a road trip with new toy Forky, who's convinced he's trash and doesn't yet understand his role in the world. Along the way, Woody is unexpectedly reunited with independent spirit Bo Peep and finds himself faced with a decision, and a future, he never imagined.

content.title: Hateful eight
content.short_summary: Summaries. In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters. Some time after the Civil War, a stagecoach hurtles through the wintry Wyoming landscape.

content.title: Star wars
content.short_summary: The Last Jedi follows Rey as she seeks the aid of Luke Skywalker, in hopes of turning the tide for the Resistance in the fight against Kylo Ren and the First Order, while General Leia Organa, Finn, and Poe Dameron attempt to escape a First Order attack on the dwindling Resistance fleet.

content.title: Whiplash
content.short_summary: Whiplash is a 2014 American drama film written and directed by Damien Chazelle. It depicts the relationship between an ambitious jazz drummer (Miles Teller) and an abusive bandleader (J. K. Simmons) at the fictional Shaffer Conservatory.

content.title: The Intouchables
content.short_summary: The Intouchables tells the true story of a wealthy, physically disabled risk taker, the picture of established French nobility, who lost his wife in an accident and whose world is turned upside down when he hires a young, good-humored, black Muslim ex-con as his caretaker.

content.title: Gladiator
content.short_summary: Crowe portrays Roman general Maximus Decimus Meridius, who is betrayed when Commodus, the ambitious son of Emperor Marcus Aurelius, murders his father and seizes the throne. Reduced to slavery, Maximus becomes a gladiator and rises through the ranks of the arena to avenge the murders of his family and his emperor.
